thread.title: Arsenal striker Alexis Sanchez upset Chile team-mates with fan-snubbing tantrum after loss to Argentina, according to reports
thread.title_full: Arsenal striker Alexis Sanchez upset Chile team-mates with fan-snubbing tantrum after loss to Argentina, according to reports

author: wally Downes
title: Arsenal striker Alexis Sanchez upset Chile team-mates with fan-snubbing tantrum after loss to Argentina, according to reports
text:
NO RESPECT Arsenal striker Alexis Sanchez upset Chile team-mates with fan-snubbing tantrum after loss to Argentina, according to reports 
All of the Chile players went over to thank their supporters for making the trip but the Gunners star stormed straight down the tunnel By Wally Downes Jr
